item.title: Data Structure Basics
item.description: What is Data Structure? Data structures are ways to store data in an organized fashion so that it can be used efficiently. Just like there are many ways (i.e alphabetically or by genre) you can organize your books in a bookshelf. Types Linear : Array, Linked List, Stack, Queue etc Non Linear : Tree, Graph etc Operations We can do different types of operations on different data structures.
